Lake_Charles.Church of the Good Shepherd (Lake Charle: The Church of the Good Shepherd is an historic Episcopal church building located at 715 Kirkman Street in Lake Charles, Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana, United States. Designed by noted Dallas architect C.W. Bulger in the Gothic Revival style of architecture, it was built of stone in 1896. On December 22, 1983, it was added to the National Register of Historic Places.
